questions.question: Which of the following is correct about Angular 2 Directive??
questions.a: A directive is a custom HTML element that is used to extend the power of HTML
questions.b: A directive can be used to import the functionality from other Angular JS modules

questions.question: Which of the following is correct about tsconfig.json?
questions.a: This file is used to give options about TypeScript used for Angular JS project
questions.b: This file contains information about Angular 2 project
questions.c: This file conatin the system files required for Angular JS application
